1. 資本投資業者は、取引所の運営に関わることを責任とす

×

この記述は正しくありません。金融商品取引法における有価証券報告書の訂正後の財務計算に関する書類が含まれている場合でも、その書類に対して公認会計士や監査法人の監査証明を必要とすることはありません。実際には、訂正後の書類が含まれている場合でも、それに対して公認会計士や監査法人の監査証明を

×

### 解 Written in English ###

The given statement is incorrect. According to the Financial Instruments and Exchange Act, even if a foreign company submits financial statements that are equivalent to certifications under laws or regulations of other countries' governmental authorities (such as the Cabinet Order), it does not exempt them from obtaining an official audit report by a Japanese public accountant or a supervisory law firm. Therefore, the correct answer is "×".

保証業務における規準は，保障提 Written as a letter to the editor of your local newspaper.

Dear Editor,

I am writing to express my concern about the increasing number of plastic bottles being discarded improperly in our community. Plastic pollution is not only an eyesore but also poses significant environmental threats that we cannot afford to ignore any longer. It's high time for us as a community to take collective action towards reducing this menace and promoting sustainable practices.

Plastic bottles, specifically single-use plastic water bottles, are one of the most common forms of litter found in our streets, parks, and natural areas. These non-biodegradable items can take hundreds to thousands of years to decompose, during which they release harmful chemicals into the soil and groundwater. Moreover, when plastic waste is not properly disposed of or recycled, it often ends up in our oceans, causing severe damage to marine life through ingestion, entanglement, and habitat destruction.

The detrimental effects of plastic pollution on the environment are well-documented, but they also have significant economic implications
